MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the PA14 postcode area of Port Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.11pm. Our control centre has managed to remotely restore power to some customers and our emergency response team have now arrived at the Port Glasgow primary substation to locate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.15pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:20pm on Friday, 26th of February 2021.
